phrases: They are all working very hard.
This is the inside of a human body.
We will collect your carbon dioxide here.
Next, I will deliver this oxygen to everyone in the liver.
I see you are starting to get the hang of it.
Though you are still making blunders.
Senpai, it is all thanks to your warm guidance every
I am not one to stand on ceremony.
Anyway, there is something I would like you to do for me.
I would like you to take on this rookie Red Blood Cell, and train her.
Not when I am not even full-fledged myself!
This is part of your job!
you had other Red Blood Cells looking after you, too, did not you?
So think of this as your way of paying them back.
That is how it was for me, too.
And if anything happens, let me know right away!
Jeez, she is so calm and collected!
Why are you speaking so formally to me?
I am your kouhai, are not I?
Oh, that is right, you are!
Now I have gone and thrown my kouhai into a state of confusion!
Jeez, I am such an idiot!
I am the senpai here, so I need to be strong!
It would only because her misery if she sees me as a flaky senpai,
Now then, l-let me show you all kinds of things!
Yes, I look forward to your guidance.
Listen, let me start by explaining what it is we do.
The six functions of the blood.
Of these six, our main job as Red Blood Cells is the exchange of gases, right?
Although we also take on the extra task of transporting nutrients
which is not really our job.
After we deliver oxygen to the tissue cells, they burn up glucose,
producing energy, carbon dioxide and water.
And since carbon dioxide is toxic to the body and must be expelled,
we transport it to the pulmonary alveoli,
Then rinse, lather and repeat, I hear.
And that is why we, Red Blood Cells, are indispensable
What can I teach this kid... no, I mean this hotshot?
for maintaining the cycle of life, correct?
And I am honored to be charged with such a job.
I see, so you already know all that, huh?
for now, let us go circulate for real!
It is okay if you do not understand.
Just try to learn stuff as you go along!
Come to think of it, what should I say to a kouhai?
If only she would save the job descriptions and all for when we are on the move.
This one's a little inefficient, I see.
No Red Blood Cell brats allowed!
Sorry to shock you like that.
I am always making wrong turns.
But that person right now was more aggressive than he needed to be.
That was what did not sit well with me.
it is not our job to get screamed at by that person, is it now?
Senpai, you know those from the immune system?
Neutrophils are a gang of anomalies who confuse justice with violence.
He is gentle when you talk to him.
Thanks for your hard work, White Blood Cell!
That Red Blood Cell next to you...
I have been given the task of training her, and I have been showing her the ropes!
Not that I have taught her anything yet.
You see, there are different types of White Blood Cells working in this blood vessel.
We, White Blood Cells, have several types of jobs.
And then, you have your lymphatic vessels, too.
Everyone is a little scared of White Blood Cell here,
but he is really such a nice guy!
That is your brand-new uniform, and now it is sticky with blood spatter!
I do not mind at all.
Look, since you are soaking wet,
I brought you something warm to drink.
There is milk and sugar, too.
Let us both drink and warm up!
No, normally, should not you bring me a towel and not a drink?
I have got to be more senpai-like!
As for who we are going to deliver the oxygen we are transporting from the lungs...
Anyway, we would better hurry up and hand it over.
Then, when you hand it over, look them in the eye and say with a smile,
in a clear voice, I have come to deliver your...
- You do not have to tell me that, either. -
after they take it, get their signature or stamp,
and some people will say, Thank you for your hard work.
So, I always say, Oh no, I am just doing my job.
You want to know how amazing?
She took on this gigantic enemy called a parasite,
and stabbed it from mid-air like this!
I wish you could have seen her that day!
I mean, she was totally, unbelievably cool!
P-P-Please, do not heap so much praise on me!
The little Platelets' job is to close up wounds,
and even though they are tiny, they protect the peace inside this blood vessel.
Please do not get tangled in the fibrin!
Dendritic Cell, Macrophage, thank you for your hard work!
By any chance, are you a trainer now?
I have still got a long ways to go!
Senpai, we would better make that delivery.
All right, if you will excuse us please!
Senpai, I do not think it is that way.
Let us take breaks here and there when we get tired!
That was not my fault, all right?
You let out too much histamine!
Now, now, just calm down, Memory!
Jeez, would you mind not losing it all of a sudden?
Do not ever let things faze you!
Senpai, you will be in the way if you stand there.
Senpai, you are going the wrong way.
Senpai, please get a hold of yourself.
Wow, is this where they produce all the transmitters?
There are a bunch of different types, too.
Wonder if she is handling her kouhai all right.
S-Sorry for being such an unreliable senpai!
No, please do not worry about it.
This time, I am going to do a good job guiding you!
So this is that way, and that way is...
If you are going back to the lungs from here, make a right.
a day just like any other was unfolding.
But the order is for all blood cells to gather in the center of the body!
You would better hurry or the blood cells here will...
This overpowering blood pressure is sweeping them towards us!
What is causing this spike in blood pressure?
I do not have a clue, either!
All migrating White Blood Cells, please gather immediately!
Extremely severe issues are cropping up everywhere.
It is chaos out in the field,
and it looks like it is going to take time to get to the bottom of this!
At this rate, it is only a matter of time before we are invaded by antigens.
I am declaring a state of emergency!
We are now in a state of emergency.
We are now in a state of emergency.
The tissue and blood vessels near the head area have been severely damaged.
prepare for an antigen invasion from the damaged areas,
and hurry to the scene immediately.
We are now in a state of emergency.
The tissue and blood vessels near the head area have been severely damaged.
prepare for an antigen invasion from the damaged areas,
and hurry to the scene immediately.
All Platelets are requested to gather at the damaged areas at once.
All Red Blood Cells are requested to continue transporting oxygen
For now, let us deliver this oxygen!
The blood flow's faster than usual!
I am sure it will be fine!
But the body temp has not gone up!
Now's our chance to take over this body for our
Those White Blood Cells show up so soon in the tissue!
I will have to escape somewhere far from this vessel!
I am getting closer to the wound, huh?
So the Red Blood Cells must be under attack by the antigens there!
It is so quiet in here.
We are now in a state of emergency.
The tissue and blood vessels near the head area have been severely damaged.
prepare for an antigen invasion from the damaged areas,
and hurry to the scene immediately.
Where are all the blood cells?
Do not tell me they are all...
It is all over for this world!
I am going to transport oxygen until the very end!
